name: Roller Ball (itch) (Betabit)
description:
Cross roads full of difficult obstacles with your ball!

Control the ball with your finger to bypass various obstacles and stages!

What you have to do is to cross all the obstacles to reach the finish line and go to the next level.

Beware, if you hit any obstacle you will return to the beginning of the level!

Choose your ball from more than 15 different balls and set out to pass the different stages.

Choose the look of your track from 10 different genres.
